3: Holy Maiden, you're finally here. And you, heroes.
I would prefer not to be classified together with them.
The Demon King 'Celica' stood right in front of us. She turned over and greeted us like friends.
Could you tell us why we have to fight?
Because the Demon King must be defeated by heroes. Only by doing so can you bring peace to the world.

2: We have already defeated the King. Is that not enough?
4: We can have world peace if you stop what you are doing.

3: Of course not. He was only a system bug, not a condition for world peace.
More Kings like him would be created if I stop now.
This game world was originally set in the way that, peace would be restored once the heroes had defeated the Demon King.
In the last run, the heroes didn't complete their quest but ended the game abruptly, causing the world to crash.
I didn't want to continue hurting others, so a system error occurred, creating a King who replaced my position.
Were you part of the reason why that King turned evil?
Yes. That's why I wanted to stop his plan myself.
Unless you destroy me completely, this game will never end properly and it's a matter of time before the next King shows up.
...Demon King, is killing you our only option?
After the farewell message, the Demon King was engulfed in darkness, until an alien-like creature crawled out.
That was the true form of the Demon King.
Time to save the world, heroes!
